dropRemoveFavorite: Drop here to remove from favorite
timelineActionComment: Commented on the {content_type} {content_title}
publicVisibility: Community and its contributions are visible for employees.
privateVisibility: Community is visible in suggestions and search results. Only members can see contributions. Employees can request to join the community.
secretVisibility: Community and its contribution are visible for members only. Only owners can invite members.
disabledVisibility: Community is not visible for contractors. They can not be invited.
deactivateContentDisplayInWhatsNewHelp: If selected, users will not see the community's contributions in the What's new. To see them, they can select Follow community in My communities. On selecting this option, the change will only affect non explicit members of the community.
disableContentType: Are you sure you want to disabled this Content Type ? All default contents of this Content Type will be removed.
deleteContentType: Are you sure you want to delete this Content Type ? All default contents of this Content Type will be removed.
statusList: Status list: (You can not get less than three status)
minimumStatus: Minimum status of an idea to transfer it:
name: Name
messageInfoDefaultWiki: The selected pages will be included as subpages in the default content
